subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: Richard Emery, a lawyer for Brian McNamee, said Monday that Rusty Hardin could not represent Roger Clemens because he represented Andy Pettitte for at least a week before the Mitchell report.
snippet: Richard Emery, a lawyer for Brian McNamee, said Monday that Rusty Hardin could not represent Roger Clemens because he represented Andy Pettitte for at least a week before the Mitchell report.
